block.p: Manhattan

EAST MIDTOWN $2.06 million 425 East 58th Street (Sovereign) 2-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 2,400-sq.-ft. co-op in prewar building; maid's room, laundry, balcony; fitness center; maintenance $3,879, 59% tax-deductible; listed at $2.295 million, 36 weeks on market (brokers: Prudential Douglas Elliman; Kathy Matson)
UPPER EAST SIDE

$870,000 345 East 81st Street (Eton House) 2-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. penthouse co-op in postwar building; granite kitchen counters, Sub-Zero, marble baths; maintenance $1,310, 59% tax-deductible; listed at $849,000 (multiple bids), 22 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

HAMILTON HEIGHTS $555,000 504 West 136th Street (Hamilton Parc) 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,028-sq.-ft. condo in new building; part-time doormen; bamboo floors; common roof deck in building; common charge $611; taxes $84 (abated); listed at $555,000, 12 weeks on market (brokers: Bellmarc Realty; Halstead Property)

HUDSON HEIGHTS $314,000 875 West 181st Street 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 620-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; entry foyer, renovated eat-in kitchen, high ceilings, north exposure; maintenance $459, 37% tax-deductible; listed at $314,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Simone Song Properties)
Bronx

MORRIS PARK $464,000 1825 Lurting Avenue 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 82-year-old detached brick house; enclosed front porch; dining room, eat-in kitchen, den, stand-up attic, semifinished basement; common driveway, 1-car garage; 25-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,718; listed at $509,000, 8 weeks on market (broker: J. A. Villani Realty)
Brooklyn
KENSINGTON

$600,000 3555 12th Avenue 4-bedroom, 2-bath, prewar brick town house; dining area, kitchen with windows, den, high ceilings, original moldings and detail; 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $2,600; listed at $650,000, 6 weeks on market (broker: Coldwell Banker Hunt Kennedy & Garfield)

WINDSOR TERRACE $357,500 185 Prospect Park SW 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 900-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; elevator, entry foyer; kitchen with dining area; common garden and laundry in building; maintenance $695, 38% tax- deductible; listed at $365,000, 14 weeks on market (broker: Orrichio Anderson)
Queens

FOREST HILLS $1.025 million 68-09 Exeter Street 2-family, 77-year-old detached 3-story brick-sided house; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths, dining room, eat-in kitchen, wood-burning fireplace, sunroom in primary duplex; 1 bedroom, 1 bath, dining area, gas fireplace in simplex; 2-car garage, 29-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,868; listed at $1.18 million, 20 weeks on market (broker: Weichert Realtors FH Realty)
REGO PARK

$285,000 97-10 62nd Drive (Park City) 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, dining area, terrace; seasonal pool in building; maintenance $774, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $325,000, 15 weeks on market (broker: Century 21 Benjamin)

$2,112,500 51 Shore Road 4-bedroom, 3 1/2-bath, 107-year-old, wood-sided Victorian-style house; front porch; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen with upgraded appliances, family room, renovated bath, sitting area off master bedroom; hardwood floors, original moldings and detail, 2-car garage, 0.32-acre lot; taxes $9,333; listed at $2.175 million, 4 weeks on market (brokers: Coldwell Banker Curtis; Prudential Connecticut Realty)
Ohio
CINCINNATI
